3: The three of them set out before dawn.
We are getting closer and closer to the war zone.
The ground still remains hot from the battle, making their journey arduous as they climb over the ruins.
The girl lets out a small surprised scream at a piles of bodies nearby, but then quiets down shortly.
Just up ahead, and we're there.
A mechanical monster jumps down from a tall building and roars, alerting more machines to come out from the surroundings.
Tell me you have a backup plan.
The backup plan is—get behind me!
